messages.subject: Commercial Message - New items at Ricecracker
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, Just got in a lot of new nice items. Posted some of them on the site at Ricecracker.com (http://www.ricecracker.com) Here are some of the items:
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
Just got in a lot of new nice items. Posted some of them on the site at Ricecracker.com
(http://www.ricecracker.com)

Here are some of the items:
M-5 (#813) Spectacular Tokubetsu Hozon Kaga Goto Menuki
M-9 (#814) 5th Mainline Goto Master Tokujo menuki
T-9 (#810) Excellent tsuba by the Famous Nishigaki School
T-11(#811) Very Nice Choshu Amaryu Tsuba

Also have a couple of good Dai-Sho.
I will be putting up a Rare REAL Dai Sho By Yasukuni Yasutake over the next couple of days.

We have many swords and kodogu that never make it to the site, so if you don't see what you are looking for it is a good idea to email us and ask.

Also for those of you going to the San Francisco Sword Show be sure to come by our tables and ask for John to get that special show deal!
See you all at the show,
John Kurata
